data.name: Warface — "Armageddon" equipment set
data.detailed_description:
About the "Armageddon" set


Excellent equipment, which will become a pearl in the arsenal of any player. Set bonus includes: reload speed + 20%, claymore detection, reduces damage by 15 points per hit, protection against explosions + 30%, sprint duration + 50%. The set includes 4 helmets and 4 vests for every class, boots, and gloves.

Armageddon Rifleman Helmet

The helmet increases the protection of the head by 55% and reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Armageddon Medic Helmet

The helmet increases the protection of the head by 55% and reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Armageddon Engineer Helmet

The helmet increases the protection of the head by 55% and reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Armageddon Sniper Helmet

The helmet increases the protection of the head by 55% and reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Armageddon Rifleman Vest

The vest gives you 155 armor points and increases the weapon changing speed by 10%.

Armageddon Medic Vest

The vest gives you 155 armor points and increases the weapon changing speed by 20%.

Armageddon Engineer Vest

The vest gives you 145 armor points and increases the weapon changing speed by 20%.

Armageddon Sniper Vest

The vest gives you 125 armor points, increases the primary and secondary ammunition capacity by 50% and increases the weapon changing speed by 20%.

Armageddon Gloves

The gloves increase hand protection by 20%. And reduce recoil by 10%.

Armageddon Boots

The boots increase leg protection by 20%. Increase sprint speed by 8%. And increase movement speed while crouching by 30%.



After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: This equipment set will significantly change the course of the game. With it, you won’t let the enemy get bored!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
